name: RISE for Equity: Reflect, Inspire, Strengthen and Empower 2024
content: This conference will prioritize and address diversity, equity, inclusion and belonging in workforce development and organizational culture. This topic is essential to providing optimal patient care, achieving health equity, building fair technology and AI tools, and attracting and engaging the workforce of the future. At this groundbreaking continuing medical education conference, participants join a national healthcare dialogue on this important subject and explore evidence-based solutions and innovative initiatives. Keynote presentations by leading experts and panel discussions cover health disparities, digital equity and much more. Time: 9:00 AM - 12:45 PM Venue Details: The Mayflower Hotel, Autograph Collection, 1127 Connecticut Avenue Northwest, Washington, District of Columbia, 20036, United States Prices: General Session (LIVE in person): USD 950.00, General Session (Livestream): USD 799.00
organizers: Mayo Clinic School of Continuous Professional Development
